infpp.oceanlife.Controller

Class CalcThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • infpp.oceanlife.Controller.CalcThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class CalcThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread to control the movement and collision of OceanObjects in an given OceanInterFace. Also updates a given JList.
    Author:
    Baris Simonjan, Etienne Violet
